title: SDMAX Expandable Neon Magic Spring, Rainbow Bouncy Slinky Toys for Kids, Vibrant and Bright Colour, Hands-On Play, Lightweight and Portable (Pack of 1)
features: EXPANDABLE AND FLEXIBLE DESIGN: The Magic Spring is a coiled spring made of flexible material, allowing it to expand and contract when manipulated. When stretched out, it becomes long and spiral-shaped; when compressed, it returns to its compact form. The spring moves smoothly, allowing it to "walk" down stairs or shift from hand to hand, creating an illusion of a moving, undulating object. This makes it entertaining to watch and fun to play with.

NEON COLORS: The toy is available in a variety of neon colors, such as bright pink, green, orange, and blue. These colors make the spring visually striking, especially under low light or neon-lit environments, enhancing the fun factor. The neon colors provide a glowing, almost hypnotic effect, making it a captivating toy for children and adults alike. The colors are often bright enough to glow in dimly lit rooms, adding a cool, visual aesthetic.

FUN AND INTERACTIVE TOY: The magic spring encourages interactive play, allowing users to experiment with how the spring moves or stretches. It’s a great toy for improving hand-eye coordination and engaging children in creative activities. When placed on a step or uneven surface, the spring can "walk" down the steps, creating a playful and mesmerizing movement

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: The magic spring is lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry around or store. You can take it to play with at home, in the park, or even use it as a desk toy to play with during breaks. Its small size and durable design make it perfect for carrying around as a portable entertainment option, whether for children or as a stress-relieving toy for adults.

CREATIVE PLAY: The magic spring doesn’t come with specific instructions, so it encourages creative play. Kids can use it in various ways, such as using it for races, creating art with the spring’s shape, or even using it as part of a homemade obstacle course. In addition to being a fun toy, it can also serve as a learning tool to help children explore concepts like motion, stretching, expansion, and material properties.
description: Product Description Bring a burst of vibrant colours and endless fun with the SDMAX Expandable Neon Magic Spring. This rainbow-colored bouncy slinky toy is designed to captivate the imagination of kids and provide them with engaging entertainment. Great fun for children and adults. A great fidget toy, it will be the toy that all the kids will want to play with. Imaginative play at its best. Coloured from one end to the other in the vivid hues of the rainbow, this spring creates a mesmerizing shimmering effect during play. Kids can explore various ways to play with this versatile toy, ensuring endless amounts of fun that will keep them entertained for hours. Watch as kids revel in the excitement of this expandable neon magic spring, making it a fantastic addition to piñata party favours for boys and girls. Add a touch of magic and colour to playtime with this captivating rainbow fidget mini smile toy from SDMAX. Perfect for parties and events, this neon magic spring is an excellent choice for party favours, carnivals, sensory play, goody bags, stocking stuffers, birthday parties, teacher classroom prizes, carnival prizes, raffle prizes, and more. Its rainbow colours add a delightful and joyful element to any occasion.
